MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA10 postcode area of St.Helens, affecting properties in Hall Street, Shaw street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.05PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate the power loss and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3.15PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.41PM on 21st March 2021.
